attributes.action: Give all Key worker the Covid Vaccine now regardless of age and nhs requirements
attributes.additional_details: We are risking our lives every hour of every day , we keep the economy going all the time and we are being forgotten is not good enough !!
attributes.background: The Government should give the Covid Vaccine to all Shop workers , Postman, Teachers , Nursery Staff,Undertakers , Construction Workers, Bus drivers , Taxi Drivers , Police, Army, Hairdressers all customer facing jobs Now

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prioritise teachers, school and childcare staff for Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316

Prioritise Key Retail Workers, being offered the Covid Vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426

All key workers to be higher up the list for coronavirus vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466

Prioritise early years practitioners to urgently receive Covid 19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566743
